definitions.definition: To repeatedly mention a subject, especially so as to nag or complain .
examples: Why do you harp on a single small mistake?
Why do you harp on about a single small mistake?

definitions.definition: To play on (a harp or similar instrument).
To play (a tune) on the harp.
To develop or give expression to by skill and art; to sound forth as from a harp; to hit upon.

main_definition: ( derogatory , usually with on ) To repeatedly mention a subject, especially so as to nag or complain .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To play on (a harp or similar instrument).
( transitive ) To play (a tune) on the harp.
( transitive , archaic ) To develop or give expression to by skill and art; to sound forth as from a harp; to hit upon.
